name: Bang! Bang! Demo
description:
This bottle shooter crush your head and hurt your ♥♥♥!!!
- Photorealistic graphics! (If you're drunk)
- Amazing physics and lighting (my grandmother was amazed)
- Really challenging levels (oh, don't cry, casual players!)
- The story? Dang it! Just shoot at bottles, donkey! And don't die...
- Want to try? Still would!

Vote on Steam GreenLight!
